summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Intensive Moisture Cleanser is a light and hydrating cream cleanser for dry skin. It leaves the skin feeling clean, smoother, softer and more luminous. Also, removes impurities, while actively moisturizing dry, depleted skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsRemoves make-up, sunscreen, and excess oil from the skin's surfaceThis cleanser is light, creamy, and actively nourishes while removing impuritiesInvigorating extracts of citrus, palmarosa and jasmine refresh tired skin, and it does not strip away or make skin feel tight after washingRinses away easily, leaving skin cleaner, softer and more luminousThis face wash is best for those concerned with dryness, dullness and uneven texture, and loss of firmness and elasticityKey IngredientsLipid-enriched Directly Esterified Fatty Isethionate (DEFI) Surfactant System: cleanses skin while helping to minimize damage of vital proteins and lipids that defend against drynessBioReplenish Complex with Phytoactives from Coconut and Murumuru Seed Butter: help protect barrier lipids and preserve the skin's natural resilienceExtracts of Citrus, Palmarosa, and Jasmine: refresh tired skinResearch ResultsTwice as effective at removing long wear make-up* while nourishing skin*As compared to essential cleansing solutionItem 2535737How To UseMassage onto dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water.Tip: Follow with Intensive Moisture Balance in your am/pm routine.IngredientsWater/Aqua, Glycerin Caprylic / Capric Triglycerides. Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Sodium Astrocaryum Murumuruate, Ceramide NP Phytosterols, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Hydrogenated Coconut Acid, Hydrolyzed Cottonseed Protein, Citrus, Sweet (Orange) Peel Oil, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, C12-13 Pareth-3, Sweet Almond (Almond) Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Leaf Oil, Myristic Acid, Trideceth-12, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Oil, Linoleic Acid, Amyris Balsamifera Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Massage onto dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water.Tip: Follow with Intensive Moisture Balance in your am/pm routine.
ingredients: Glycerin Caprylic / Capric Triglycerides. Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate

reviews.headline: Smells awful
reviews.comments: I mistakenly bought this instead of the Microfoliant and it smells like cat litter when you get it wet. It's awful and doesn't work as well as the microfoliant.

reviews.headline: Goes Rancid
reviews.comments: I really liked this cleanser when i first got it about 2 months ago. I kept it in the shower and have been using it regularly. The smell never was 'good' but now it is straight up rancid smelling like it's gone bad. No, it is not expired. I would have bought this again until this happened.

reviews.headline: Been using for years!
reviews.comments: This is a great clean product. I have been using it for years. I have sensitive skin and this does not cause irritation, redness or breakouts.

reviews.headline: Been using for years!
reviews.comments: This is a great product. I have sensitive skin, and this product does not irritate or cause redness. I use it with the Special Cleansing Gel.

reviews.headline: Really nice - makes my skin even and soft
reviews.comments: Was glad this worked for my skin after reading all the 'burning' reviews.  Have only been using for a few days but my skin feels softer and 'even', which I haven't really experienced before.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I have been using for it about two weeks and so far I like it.  It cleans well, does not make my face tight and I can use it on my eyes with no issue.

reviews.headline: Burns skin üò¨
reviews.comments: This product scares me. I've always been able to handle any products put on my face, but this product BURNED my skin while using it. It literally felt like I was rubbing tiny shards of glass into my face and it stung really badly. Even after using it, it still feels like I have burns 2 hours later. This is so weird. I've used Dermalogica products off and on for years, but this was just a huge miss for me.

reviews.headline: Face is so soft
reviews.comments: I love how soft and clean my face feels after using this. Dermalogica has some of my favorite products and this is a new favorite!

reviews.headline: Works as it says
reviews.comments: I struggle with stress breakouts and post menopauseal breakouts. This works well using it daily.  Seems likevits has completely removed any issues

reviews.headline: Best product ever
reviews.comments: Dermalogica did their thing with this one. My skin is sensitive and this doesnt not irritate it at all. It is so finely milled, im not sure how it would cause irritation unless you are really putting your elbows into it when washing your face. I use this at least 5 days a week and the bottle lasts me 5+ months so it may seem pricey but it is worth it. Also leaves my skin so glowy and shiny and clean.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have always struggled with exfoliants and acne products in general since I have extremely sensitive skin especially around my mouth. I had gotten chemical burn from face washes before and it hurts REAL BAD. I used Dermalogica's Milkfoliant and fell in love with it but when I tried this product it gave me terrible chemical burn and peeled my skin to the point it was raw. I would be careful with this one.

reviews.headline: Skin like Buttah!
reviews.comments: I have never, and I mean NEVER had anything clean out the pores on my nose like this does.  It's like buttah!  Now, I will say that I am not a sensitive-skin type, so I could see how it might cause some people to have a reaction because it has a lot of exfoliating ingredients and it sucks your pores CLEAN!  I will probably use 2-4 times a week because it does an amazing job and won't need it every day.

reviews.headline: Love love love this product!!
reviews.comments: Amazing product!!

reviews.headline: 5y and going
reviews.comments:
I use this 1-2times a week.
I wet my face, neck and both hands -then add dime size amount to palm. gently rub small amount onto face until the microexfoliant turns to cream-if it's too abrasive rub in your palm until it turns creamy. you will still get the benefit of the exfoliant.
My skin is brighter and this  enhances the use of my skin care.
Wear sunscreen

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: If this is burning ur skin ur probably over exfoliating with ur other acid products or treatments/scrubs. At the end of the day this is going to scrub ur skin so treat it as such. This is super gentle, & i have sensitive skin. You can opt for the milkfoliant if you are using 50 scrubs a week.

reviews.headline: So pleased with this exfoliant
reviews.comments: I desperately needed an exfoliant. I was looking at this one, because of the clean ingredients. This product makes my skin feel so smooth. There is little to no scent.  I am using daily to every other day. Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comments: This exfoliant is WAY to harsh for your face. You can literally feel it tearing your skin and then in stings even more as you rub it in. If it didnt have the bigger chunkier pieces and it was just the charcoal, it would be fine but those rice pieces are way to harsh even with the most minimal pressure.

reviews.headline: Okay for daily exfoliation
reviews.comments: Very light exfoliation. I have gad an issue where the exfoliation particles dissolved when adding water. Not the exfoliation I was really looking for. Would recommend to someone with sensitive skin looking for a super light exfoliation product

reviews.headline: Good but messy
reviews.comments: I like it but the powder is a bit messy for me

reviews.headline: Burned my skin
reviews.comments: I used this product one time and it burned my face ,if I sweated just a drop it felt like my face was on burning. I tried to call the company and of course, there is no real person to talk to, you have to leave your name and phone number.It's been two days and i've never got a call back. I called ulta and it's a run around. They wanted pictures of my face. I think I am done with dermatologica and ulta. I asked if I could just return it to the store. They make returns very difficult.

media.headline: The Perfect Cleanser For Dry Skin!!!
media.caption: Dermalogica Intensive Moisture Cleanser 5.1 FL OZ

media.headline: The Perfect Cleanser For Dry Skin!!!
media.caption: As someone who struggles with super dry skin and constantly in search of skincare that truly moisturizes and brings my skin back to life, so to speak, finding a cleanser that doesn't strip your skin of the good stuff and dry it out is a tall order! Thankfully, I've now been introduced to Dermalogica's new Intensive Moisture Cleanser and that 'tall order' has just been met, because this cleanser is absolutely wonderful! Although it's great for all skin, it really tackles dry skin beautifully by hydrating and replenishing while it cleans. I'm not entirely sure how Dermalogica accomplished this, but thanks to this ingenious and innovative formula, my skin looks and feels clean, soft & supple, as well as radiant! I only need a small dollop of this rich and creamy cleanser to get a thorough clean each time. In addition to the excellent performance of this skincare product, the science and ingredients that make up this cleanser are just as impressive! This skincare formula does the dirty work of cleaning thoroughly while working simultaneously to protect the lipids and proteins in our skin from being stripped away! That's what makes this skincare cleanser stand apart from other cleansers, in my opinion. If you're looking for a cleanser that cleans, softens, hydrates, and protects in addition to leaving you with a radiant glow, then I wouldn't pass Dermalogica's Intensive Moisture Cleanser up!

media.headline: Totally in love with this product
media.caption: The Hack for healthy glowing skin

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this as a sample from ULTA when making a purchase. I have used it almost every day for about 2 weeks. I use my normal cleanser first and then apply this superfoliant. I only use a very small amount, massaging the product on my face and neck for about 1 minute or so, while in the shower. I have tried a variety of Dermalogica products (wanting to love them) but I have not been won over by any particular one yet - until this one! I absolutely loved it from the very first use. I have extremely fair and sensitive skin. Most products I cannot use daily, but so far this one has been fine for daily use. The major differences I've noticed in my skin are clearer pores and softer texture.
faceoff_positive.headline: Will purchase full size bottle

faceoff_negative.comments: I had a sample of this product and decided to try it out since I developed a few weird little bumps on the side of my nose my regular exfoliant just wasn't getting rid of. BAD IDEA!! I thought that since it said "daily", that meant it wouldn't be anything crazy harsh and my skin could handle it fine. My skin is dry, sensitive, and prone to break outs, but it's taken things that are marketed as much stronger than this and been okay. This BURNS. I couldn't rinse it off fast enough, and even then, my skin was bright red and hot. I put a sleeping mask on to calm my skin down after using this thing just once. Daily??? If your skin can take this thing daily, I'm jealous. Those of you with skin that's more like mine should keep as far away from this stuff as possible (it's mostly baking soda ... wish I'd read the ingredients more closely before using it).
faceoff_negative.headline: Stay away from this if you have sensitive skin!
